package.name: J2t_Mobilestats
package.summary: J2T Magento Mobile Stats is creating a bridge between your store and a mobile application!
package.description:
J2T Magento Mobile Stats is creating a bridge between your store and a mobile application!
It is possible with this module to check:
your sales quantity/amount with a graph most viewed products the bestsellers new customers customers that buy the most last 5 orders last 5 search terms top 5 search terms Download the Android or iPhone app to enjoy!
You simply need to put your store URL and your admin username/password to access to the above details!
